name: LEGION (itch) (Drasnus)
description:
Somewhere in the depths of a high-security base, a 4th dimensional being escapes and takes control of the nearest body. It isn't enough - it wants more.

Speed your way through the base collecting bodies. Dodge bullets with inhuman reflexes.
If you get hit, a body will drop, but you have plenty to spare.

The concept of an incorporeal being who collects bodies was intended to tie in with the theme of 'start with nothing', although it's a bit shaky I know.

The game is currently Windows only, but I plan to port a html5 browser version after I fix a couple bugs.

This game was created in Gamemaker Studio 1.4.

I have included the project folder to the game.

Software used:

- Gamemaker Studio 1.4
- Beepbox (sounds and music)
- GraphicsGale (sprites)
- paint.net (additional sprites)

This game was created by Drasnus/CrunchyKingCobra for Ludum Dare 45.

Please do not use the assets for unrelated projects or commercial reasons.

Please feel free to use the project for learning or for creating derivative non-commercial projects.
